task.title: Add Review Comments
task.shortdesc: A reviewer can add comments to the topic. The comments will not appear in the published output.

step.cmd: Place your cursor in the text to which the comment will apply.
step.stepresult: A comment field is displayed in the right margin

step.cmd: Type your comment in the gray area

choices.choice: Choose Save to add your comment, or

step.cmd: To edit or delete a comment, choose the appropriate option from the sidebar (hamburger) menu
To reply to a comment, click in the text area of the comment and type your reply in the gray area.

choices.choice: Choose Reply to add your comment
